name: Dress Rush Brain Game
description:
Dress Rush - keep matching the dress with gender together in order to collect gold coins. A fast paced game keeps you engaged in moment of boredom. Keep trying different characters and cloths from our vast collection. It will keep you engaged with increase in speed with time. A challenge to collect 250 coins, and you'll get a bonus. However, this is not impossible but a real challenge. That's all for now, See u in Game...

!!!----------------------- A Real Time Killer-----------------------!!!!
